message: I'm being fair, but I want most of the money.  Accept this and we both get something!
My turn to be fair!  Let's split it reasonably so we can both walk away with a good amount.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a good share to make this worthwhile. Let's avoid going further into the game and losing money to inflation.
Inflation is eating our money!  Let's end this now with a fair 50/50 split.
